Name: Bigben-Discord
Overview: Big Ben Clock Discord-Bot is an self-hosted (useless) Discord Bot, that joins every Hour in an pre selected Voice channel, and plays the Big Ben Bells, to inform you, that you have entered an new Hour.

BOT_TOKEN.Name: BOT_TOKEN
BOT_TOKEN.Description: Get an Bot-Token from the Discord Developer Portal and Enter it here

DATABASE_URL.Name: DATABASE_URL
DATABASE_URL.Description: Change the URL to your PostgreSQL host, to get it working
